The work, under title Naqd al-Nathr, has been attributed by Ṭāhā Ḥusayn and ʻAbd al-Ḥamīd al-ʻAbbādī to Qudāmah. The present editors, on the basis of a newly discovered MS., attribute it to Abū al-Ḥusayn Isḥāq ibn Ibrāhīm al-Kātib, an otherwise unknown author.
